replies.msg:
The Investigation Committee has considered this matter and it was resolved that:-

調查委員會已審查此個案並議決如下：


The Law Society will take up the complaints against Mr. Ho Kwan Yiu referred by members of the public (“Informants”) as complainant. As all conduct investigation is confidential, the Informants will not be informed of the progress or result of the investigation.
律師會將以投訴人的身份接手由公眾人士（“舉報人士”）提出的針對何君堯律師的投訴，由於所有專業操守調查均屬保密，舉報人士將不會被告知調查的進展情況或結果。

(中英文本如有歧義，概以英文文本為準。)


We thank you for drawing this matter to the attention of the Law Society.

就閣下向本會提出此事宜，審查及紀律常務委員會向閣下致謝。



Yours faithfully,

(This is electronic document. No signature is required.)
（此乃電子函件，無需簽署）

The Standing Committee on Compliance
The Law Society of Hong Kong
審查及紀律常務委員會
香港律師會　謹啟
